name: Dragon Dive
description:
Dragon Dive, a 7dRL made for the 2018 7dRL Challenge

Inspired by my love of https://www.myabandonware.com/game/pitfall-15

Thanks to Tommy Ettinger and Jim Shelton for providing code and design help!

Based on SquidLib, the best Java Roguelike library! https://github.com/SquidPony/SquidLib
